mainSequence.step: Curator accesses the item/component page on the UI Dashboard.
UI Dashboard validates the access request with the Authorization Module.
Authorization Module grants access to the UI Dashboard.
UI Dashboard requests item/component details from the Retrieval Module.
Retrieval Module queries the Database for item/component details and deletion date.
Database returns the requested data to the Retrieval Module.
Retrieval Module displays item/component details and deletion date on the UI Dashboard.
UI Dashboard shows the item/component page with deletion date to the Curator.
